Commands.Waterwhirl: 4-hit Water melee BRV attackSelf: 3 turns Enfeeblement Up IIMastery with 2 uses
Commands.Waterwhirl+: Potent 4-hit melee BRV attack.Self: 3 turns Enfeeblement Up II
Commands.Cannonfire: Ranged BRV attackTarget: Low chance 3 turns Poison, ATK Down I, DEF Down IMastery with 2 uses
Commands.Cannonfire+: Ranged BRV attack.Target: Fair chance Poison, ATK Down I, DEF Down I for 3 turns

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Waterwhirl: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Waterwhirl by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Cannonfire: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Cannonfire by 10%.

Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Waterwhirl Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Waterwhirl.
Passives.Master Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV after mastering an ability.
Passives.Cannonfire Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Cannonfire.
Passives.Cannonfire Charge: Increases the max uses of Cannonfire by 1.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Waterwhirl Charge: Increases the max uses of Waterwhirl by 1.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Leader's Command: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV of all allies when HP is under 50%.
Passives.Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Waterwhirl Extension: Waterwhirl use +2Mastery requirement for Waterwhirl to become Waterwhirl+ reduced by 1When using Waterwhirl, Waterwhirl+:• Slight damage boost• Increased damage dealt to debuffed targetsAfter using Waterwhirl, Waterwhirl+:• Triggers additional HP attack• BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ for 5 turns
Passives.All Mastery Boost Speed: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV, SPD upon ability mastery
Passives.Cannonfire Extension: Cannonfire use +2When using Cannonfire, Cannonfire+:• Moderate damage boost• Becomes group attack• Slight Poison, ATK Down, DEF Down boost
